Text:
HELLO
I have got a compaq presario laptop . it was recently formated , how ever after formating the resolution is very bad , pictures appear skewed .Also windows update does not work .can u advice?
herves ..... have you just re-formatted or have you restored it to original factory settings?
Sound like it missing video driver, go to compaq or hp look for video device driver base on the model of your laptop
When you reformat you HAVE to reinstall all drivers including video drivers. you can get most of em just by doing a windows update
GO WITH VENDOR DRIVERS(NVIDIA, ATI, INTEL ETC.) BEFORE WINDOWS UPDATE DRIVERS ESPECIALLY FOR VIDEO, THEY ARE KNOWN TO CAUSE BAD THINGS TO HAPPEN ESPECIALLY IF THEY ARE NEW
